en: Shelters and adoption agencies often do not know if a cat is a good mouse hunter , and generally do not test for this .
baseline: 避难所和收养机构往往不知道一只猫是一只好老鼠猎人,而且一般不会对它进行测试。

en: While many mousers are great pets as well , not all are .
baseline: 虽然许多老鼠都是伟大的宠物,但并非所有都是。

en: " Barn cats " may not be socialized well with humans , although used to hunting mice for food .
baseline: “  Barn cats ” 可能与人类不很好相处, 尽管他们习惯于猎老鼠吃东西.

en: Even if you do not have a cat , you can use used kitty litter to deter mice .
baseline: 即使你没有一只猫,你也可以用旧的猫 litter来阻止老鼠。
zh: 即使没有一只猫,也可以用旧的猫litter来劝阻老鼠。
即使没有一只猫,也可以用旧的猫litter来劝阻老鼠。

en: However , once you eliminate the infestation , a cat will probably prevent reinfestation .
baseline: 然而,一旦你消除了感染,一只猫可能会防止再感染。

en: Put your trash cans far from your home .
baseline: 把垃圾桶放在远离你家的地方。

en: If you keep the cans away from the house , they are less likely to take up residence in your home .
baseline: 如果你把罐子远离房子,那么他们不太可能在你家里居住。

en: Make sure the shelter box has no nails or safety hazards .
baseline: 确保避难箱没有钉子或安全危险。

en: However , it is okay to wash just a few items with them , like blue jeans .
baseline: 不过,可以用它们洗几件东西,比如蓝色牛仔裤。
zh: 不过,你可以用它们洗了几件东西,比如蓝色牛仔裤.

en: Think similar clothing , minus the twisty-ness .
baseline: 考虑相似的服装,减去扭曲的。
